评论概述: A cute little collection of chokers!
评论详情: I got an order of these recently and just got them today! I went with the 8pc set with all the flowery and spring-looking ones and they're very cute in person! The quality surprised me with the price, nothing looked cheap at all! The ones involving embroidered-style flowers, like the daisy chain one for example, look very nice quality and so to the others.  A warning to those with thicker necks, they are a little on the short side regarding the length of the clasping chain so an extender of some kind might be needed. That part didn't bother me since I can fix it myself but other than that, these chokers are very nice! I  I also love how they were packaged, especially with the one with the flower cluster having 'especially for you' on it, very cute ♥
